text: Baba Hardev Singh (also known as Nirankari Baba; 23 February 1954 - 13 May 2016) was an Indian spiritual guru. He was the chief leader of the Sant Nirankari Mission from 1980 until his death in 2016. He was born in Delhi. Singh died on 13 May 2016 in a car accident near Montreal, Canada, aged 62. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Accidental deaths in Canada Category:Spiritual teachers Category:People from Delhi Category:Road accident deaths
title: Baba Hardev Singh
